items.name: Moonlight Flower
items.description: A rare flower that blooms only under the full moon in the Ancient Grove. Its petals glow with ethereal blue light and contain powerful purifying energy.

items.name: Cloak of Night Whispers
items.description: A mystical cloak woven with enchantments by Elder Malik. Grants the wearer enhanced stealth abilities.

items.name: Crystal Shard
items.description: A luminous crystal fragment from the Crystal Caverns. Resonates with harmonic energy that can strengthen magical seals.

items.name: Crystal Focus
items.description: A perfectly clear crystal attuned to the energies of the Ancient Grove. Enhances the user's magical abilities and focus.

items.name: Crystal Bell
items.description: A small bell crafted from pure crystal. When rung, it produces a clear tone that repels corrupted guardians.
